alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 1:28PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Arizona, including the following county, Cochise. * WHEN...Until 430 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 128 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of East Central Cochise County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
